attributes.action: not bring in graham stringer,s bill to register all motorbikes even off road racing bikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am the first to admit that illegal off road use of minimotos,scooters,go-peds and quad bikes is not only dangerous and very annoying and something has to be done, but to include all bikes which dont use the public highways is daft.bikes which race in the motogp or the british superbikes to race around the race track having to have a number plate  on the back would make us the laughing stock of the worlds biking community,the 100th TT is just around the conner lets be able to hold are heads high and let are racers worry only about winning races and not worry about wether there bike tax is due.
